---
title: RedundantThrows
summary: Thrown exception is a subtype of another
layout: bugpattern
tags: ''
severity: WARNING
---

<!--

## Suppression
Suppress false positives by adding the suppression annotation `@SuppressWarnings("RedundantThrows")` to the enclosing element.
